title: Fix Excel parser to correctly read karigar mapping columns

requirements.text: Fix the Excel parser in frontend/src/utils/excelParser.ts to correctly read karigar mapping data from columns A (Design Code), B (Generic Name), and C (Karigar Name) with exact header matching

quotes: They have exactly same column headers
Column A - design code, Column B - generic name, Column C - karigar name

acceptanceCriteria: Parser correctly identifies and reads data from columns A, B, and C
Parser matches exact header names: 'Design Code', 'Generic Name', 'Karigar Name'
All 561 validation errors are resolved when uploading the same Excel file
No 'required' errors appear for rows that contain data in all three columns

requirements.text: Add enhanced error logging to the karigar mapping Excel parser to show exactly what values are being read from each cell during parsing
acceptanceCriteria: Console logs show actual cell values being parsed for each row
Error messages include the specific row number and column being processed
Logs indicate whether header matching succeeded or failed

requirements.text: Ensure the Excel parser handles both .xls and .xlsx file formats correctly for karigar mapping uploads

constraints: Do not change the backend schema or main.mo file
Maintain the existing Excel upload UI in frontend/src/pages/MasterDesigns.tsx
Use the SheetJS library that is already integrated in the project
nonGoals: Adding support for different column orders or flexible header matching
Changing the data validation logic beyond fixing the parsing
Modifying the UI layout or styling of the Master Designs page
